message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It comes with a comprehensive set of features that cater to various needs. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to propose an offer of $15000 for it. I believe this price reflects its true value and I'm confident it will be beneficial for both of us.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, considering my budget and the value I seek, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
